headline: Global Digital Surgery Technologies Market Set for US$ 6,477.91 Million Surge by 2033 | Astute Analytica
summary: The digital surgery technologies market is currently experiencing rapid, double-digit growth fueled by the integration of cutting-edge innovations such as artificial intelligence (AI), augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), robotics, and 3D printing.Chicago, Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to recent data from Astute Analytica, the digital surgery technologies market was valued at US$ 712.9 million in 2024 and is projected to attain a valuation of US$ 6,477.91 million by 2033 a
